alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 01 at 2:06PM PST until January 02 at 8:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nevada, including the following county, Lincoln. * WHEN...Until 600 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 206 PM PST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is already occurring in Meadow Valley Wash near Ursine. - Meadow Valley Wash near Ursine is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Meadow Valley Campground and Horsethief Gulch Campground. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
